user_question: How many satellites are currently orbiting Earth, and can you generate an image of a futuristic satellite?
final_answer: There are approximately 3,372 satellites currently orbiting Earth. Image of a futuristic satellite generated. The most common purpose of these satellites is communication, including television, internet, and radio.
